channel.title: Spring Boot on Coding N Concepts
channel.description: Recent content in Spring Boot on Coding N Concepts

item.title: How to configure swagger in spring boot
item.description:
Swagger library is very useful if you are creating spring boot web application and exposing REST endpoints. Swagger generates web page for you to execute and test GET, POST, PUT, DELETE HTTP endpoints. This is helpful since you do not need to use Postman or some other tool to test REST Apis. Once you configure swagger then web page can be accessible using following URL:-

http://localhost:8080/swagger-ui.html

Follow the steps to configure swagger in your spring boot application:-

item.title: How to create and configure custom banner in spring boot
item.description:
Spring boot application comes with default banner which shows up first when you start your application.

  .   ____          _            __ _ _
 /\\ / ___'_ __ _ _(_)_ __  __ _ \ \ \ \
( ( )\___ | '_ | '_| | '_ \/ _` | \ \ \ \
 \\/  ___)| |_)| | | | | || (_| |  ) ) ) )
  '  |____| .__|_| |_|_| |_\__, | / / / /
 =========|_|==============|___/=/_/_/_/
 :: Spring Boot ::        (v2.1.3.RELEASE)

You can replace above banner with your self made custom banner in following two easy steps:-

item.title: How to disable command line properties in spring boot
item.description:
Spring Boot Application converts any command line arguments starting with --, such as --spring.profiles.active=dev to a property by default and adds them to the Spring Environment. Command line properties always take precedence over other property sources.

If you do not want command line properties to be added to the Environment, you can disable them from SpringBootApplication main method as follows:-

item.title: How to change server port in spring boot
item.description:
Spring boot web application using embedded server by default runs on port 8080. Following are the ways to change default server port from 8080 to say 9090

Follow any of the given five ways to change server port:-

item.title: How to disable default banner in spring boot
item.description:
You would have seen below spring boot banner when starting a spring boot application

item.title: Top Spring Boot Interview Questions
item.description: These Spring Boot interview questions are based on my personal interview experience. Topics are in the order of recent interview trends. Keep following this post for regular updates.
